hero.subtitle: Your journey to clean sports starts here

features.title: Supplement Verification
features.description: Advanced AI-powered analysis of supplement safety and WADA compliance, ensuring athletes' health and fair competition.
features.details: Our cutting-edge verification system cross-references global databases, providing instant, comprehensive supplement safety assessments.

features.title: Professional Network
features.description: Exclusive community platform connecting athletes, coaches, and anti-doping experts worldwide.
features.details: Secure, moderated forums for sharing experiences, seeking advice, and building a transparent athletic community.

features.title: Compliance Intelligence
features.description: AI-driven personal guidance navigating complex anti-doping regulations with precision.
features.details: Personalized consultations, real-time regulatory updates, and contextual recommendations tailored to your athletic profile.

features.title: Knowledge Ecosystem
features.description: Comprehensive, continually updated educational resources on anti-doping standards.
features.details: Interactive learning modules, expert-curated content, and multimedia resources exploring ethical sporting practices.

features.title: Regulatory Intelligence
features.description: Sophisticated tracking and analysis of evolving global anti-doping legislation.
features.details: Comprehensive monitoring of international sports governance, providing athletes with authoritative legal insights.

subscription.error: Please enter a valid email address.

feature1.title: Clean Sport Commitment
feature1.description: Learn about the importance of fair play in sports.
feature1.details: Discover how our platform supports a doping-free sporting environment.

feature2.title: Anti-Doping Chatbot
feature2.description: Get instant answers to your anti-doping questions.
feature2.details: Our AI-powered chatbot is ready to assist you 24/7.
